column2: For decisions which have been custom-coded to support 'Artifact Groupings' (eg. donate artifacts to offmap powers), artifacts of the same type will appear next to each other in the list. This can be helpful if you have a lot of duplicate artifacts, as the list may otherwise be sorted randomly. 'Artifact Groupings' are updated on every yearly pulse, so §Ryou should not normally need to take this decision!§!
This modifier prevents you from taking the "Forcibly refresh 'Artifact Groupings'" intrigue menu decision
All of your artifacts will be re-grouped.\n§RWARNING: CPU-INTENSIVE!§!
